# Example synteny file
# Format: chr1	start1	end1	chr2	start2	end2	score
chr1	1000	5000	chr1	1000	5000	0.95
chr1	6000	12000	chr1	6200	12200	0.88
chr2	500	3000	chr2	400	2900	0.92
chr2	3500	8000	chr2	3700	8200	0.85
chr3	10000	15000	chr3	10500	15500	0.90
chr3	16000	20000	chr3	15800	19800	0.87
chr4	2000	7000	chr4	1800	6800	0.93
chr4	7500	12000	chr4	7700	12200	0.89
chr5	3000	9000	chr5	3200	9200	0.91
chr5	9500	14000	chr5	9300	13800	0.86
